title: Isle of San Seriffe
content: I just found this [map](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014155815/http:/strangemaps.files.wordpress.com/2008/10/sanseriffe2.jpg) on my favorite [website](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014155815/http:/strangemaps.wordpress.com/) today.
author: popluhv

comments.content:
That's from the 1977 April Fool's Day joke of The Guardian (newspaper).  
More info [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014155815/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/San_Serriffe). :)

San Seriffe also showed up on Typophile a few weeks ago, here:

[http://typophile.com/node/48470](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014155815/http:/typophile.com/node/48470 "http://typophile.com/node/48470")
